instructions: Gently stir pork, broth, vinegar, jerk sauce, garlic, soy sauce, Worcestershire sauce, honey, and red pepper flakes together in the crock of your slow cooker.
Cook on High until the pork is easily shredded with forks, 3 to 4 hours.
title: Jerked Balsamic Pork Tenderloin
steps: Gently stir pork, broth, vinegar, jerk sauce, garlic, soy sauce, Worcestershire sauce, honey, and red pepper flakes together in the crock of your slow cooker.
Cook on High until the pork is easily shredded with forks, 3 to 4 hours.
